text:
@realDonaldTrump BRILLIANT! THAT’S EXACTLY WHAT WE NEED RIGHT NOW; MORE INTIMATE THREATS OF WAR!
Furthermore… Boats, they float in the water. Airplanes, they fly thru the sky. While you can shoot down an airplane, shooting down a boat might prove slightly redundant. #StableGenius #COVID19
